1.2.3.name: wordpress/wp-easyban
1.2.3.description:
EasyBan is a discontinued thing. THe important features have been moved into AccessQontrol, another plugin of mine. http://meandmymac.net/plugins/accessqontrol/

Features

  • Easy installation
  • Blocks persons (or domains) with a hostname or IP address from your site
  • Shows a nice template
